The claim was based on a video review by: Gabe Mirkin, who had not treated Dolly Parton personally but made a diagnosis of Bell's Palsy based on the video footage.
The video footage used by Dr: Mirkin to diagnose Dolly Parton was from an interview she gave to "60 Minutes Australia" in 2013, which is more than five years old and not recent.
A side: by-side comparison of the included picture in the article and a still from the "60 Minutes Australia" interview showed that Dolly Parton was wearing the same earrings and dress, suggesting that the image used in the article was not recent.
The article did not provide any evidence: s personal physician regarding her diagnosis of Bell's Palsy, raising doubts about the authenticity of the claim.
